    • vista.gui.VistaUtils

extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates commonly needed functionality.

      • addKeyListener

        public static void addKeyListener(javax.swing.JComponent comp,
                                  int key,
                                  int keyMode,
                                  java.lang.Object methodContainer,
                                  java.lang.String method)
        binds a method in object to a key stroke in component in a specific mode
        Parameters:
        comp - The component registering the key stroke
        key - The key to be registered
        keyMode - one of Event.SHIFT_MASK, Event.CTRL_MASK, Event.META_MASK, Event.ALT_MASK
        methodContainer - The object having the public void method
        the - public void method(ActionEvent evt);
